content.detailedDescription: At approximately 13:00 i was unloading my car with supplies for the office. i happened to gaze north into the beautiful blue skies over lax when a white spherical object caught my eye, about 30 degrees above the horizon, moving fast from east to west. i will liken the speed of the object to what you might expect of a fighter jet on mission. at first i considered it might be a balloon, but the speed was tremendous and the trajectory was straight line to the horizon and unwavering. the size of the object appeared to the eye as about the size of a very small spherical pill. the color was white, but had a metallic quality, as the sunlight seemed to reflect off the surface and i caught a glint or two. because the object was so small i did not want to take my eyes off it for fear of losing it. keeping my eye on the object, i backed to the door of my office and called for some of my colleagues to come out. they came but too late, as the object disappeared from view behind the roof line of a house. i tried to anticipate it's emergence on the other side of the house, but it never showed. i ran a little further down the street to see if i could re-acquire the object, but alas, it was gone. neat little mini-sighting.
content.summary: White orb moving east to west in skies over lax

content.detailedDescription:
I walk my dogs each morning at approx 6-6:30-7:00am. while returning home, wed stopped, and i was enjoying the early morning light/cloud patterns...Light clouds, lots of clear sky. when i looked up, and back toward my home, sse direction, i noticed a stationary, ovoid appearing object. it just remained in the same spot, no movement.  this area is near the local airport, and im quite used to seeing jet/planes/helicopters, also police helicopters. this was definitely not an aircraft im familiar with. even without my glasses, i could tell it seemed to be metallic/silvery-grey, in color,couldnt tell the size, due to distance, but it was large enough to discern clearly, even at the distance given. the sun was just coming up, and highlighted it. 

although i didnt want to, i had to get home,but i watched it for at least 5 minutes, and it didnt alter its position, remained totally stationary. when i looked up again, after reaching my home, in the same general area of the sky, it was no longer there, or at least was not visible to me.
content.summary: Observed stationary metallic object to se approx 1/2 mile high/watched for several minutes

content.detailedDescription: I dont remember the exact year, but it was sometime between 1980 & 82. i was a student in the st.Georges homes, boarding school in ketti,in the 6th or 7th grade and about 11 or 12 years old. in the nilgiris district of tamil nadu india. there were about 400 students in school those days and we used to have movie shows once a month in the dining hall which also was used as the auditorium. one evening as we were waiting for the movie show to begin, three or four of my classmates were together playing, when suddenly one of us, i do no remember who, pointed up to the sky and said "look!!! a satellite in the sky", and so all of us stopped playing and looked up at the sky and for the next 15 or 20 minutes had the most singular experience. we all thought it was a satellite in the begining. but then we noticed it was not moving in a straight line. it just appeared to be randomly moving in the sky. it appeared to us that it went near certain stars. meaning it would go near a star and stop, then it would go near another star and stop for a few seconds. this went on for some time as we watched. it was a clear cloudless night and we could see all the stars clearly. so the constellations were also clearly visible. there was this line of three stars, and it went near the first star and one of us said out loud, what if it went to the next star in line, and lo and behold, this moving star slowly moves to the second star in the line, next we said, what if it went to the third star, and it went again, this went on for may be the next 15 minutes or so, this moving star would go near every star we wanted it to go to. by then the movie show had begun and we had to go into the auditorium. we were too young to realize the seriousness of what we had experienced. we never spoke of this to anyone else. ever since once in a while i always looked up at the night sky, hoping to see this object again. never saw it again. as i grew older i later learnt that the distances between the stars are so enormous and as per the laws of physics, it would be impossible for anything to travel so quickly between these distances and in reality the stars are not really in line etc..But what still bothers me is that, how this thing was able to do what we wanted it to do and how did it make us feel that it was doing what we wanted it to do? how did it communicate with us?? i met one of my friends who was with us that night about 25 years after i left school, and he asked me..Do you remember that star??
content.summary: Star like object moving randomly in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were scoping out a house where the occult practices from a fairly good distance, about 100 yards off. there was a field near by where cows are kept to feed on the field during the winter, and they were dead quite. so was everything else in the valley. not a single sound. except for a demonic roar, that was multi-pitched, and would come from about a hundred yards off about every other minute or so. we didn't really care though.....Because we suspected we were well camouflaged and it was late enough at night to evade, which we had already done that night, if necessary.  we were overlooking an embankment about 15 yards apart from each other. he was ahead of me. i was looking at him to get the go ahead to move because our presence was already known there. he suddenly froze, then started sprinting in my direction. under his breath he told me to run, and run we did, for about 1.5 miles. along the way we could hear the multi-pitched voice call to its buddies, and they would call back, in their multi-pitched voices. when we finally got out and got to have a cigarette, he told me what happened. the house we were checking had company. as ----- was checking out the house, a 8.0 to 8.5 foot tall cloaked being came to the window and looked directly at him. he said he froze from it's stare, and then saw it make a go for the door of the house. he made for it when that happened and we both ran. he said the thing wasn't human, and wasn't very happy.....We didn't speak an entire word on the ride back. the feeling down there is death, and you have to accept it to face these guys. worst trepidation of my life...No joke. when we got back to __________, his eyes started to bleed. they bleed for about the next full day. couldn't really find anything on the internet to collaborate this experience, but we did meet another group of 2 from the area that had the same exact thing happen to them, eyes bleeding and all. i have suspect evidence to believe that it was reptilian, from the near abduction instances from the triangles down there, and other personal witness of reptilians in the area.
content.summary: 7 foot tall cloaked being, reptoid.

content.detailedDescription:
I was preparing to leave work and went outside to check my text messages on my cell phone, it doesnt work inside the building, and while i was out there i recalled being told there could be northern lights visible from the recent solar activity so started to scan the sky. 
when looking around i saw a large bright yellow object over to the west by the airport,  but it wasnt moving. i then saw what i know was a plane a little ways off to the right of the object. 
my first thought was that is a ufo and the plane which appeared smaller was investigating it. then i told myself i was being dramatic but i continued watching because the object was curious and i again started questioning what my eyes were seeing so i took a picture and a short video clip with my phone. 
the plane continued on but the large object appeared to be in the same spot as it was when i first noticed it just glowing brightly. then it almost seemed to have moved closer in an instant but there was no audible noise as there had been with the plane. 
i  became embarassingly and increasingly nervous about it seeming to move closer and went back into the building to collect the rest of my belongings. when i came back out the object was gone. and i have to admit i felt a bit relieved.
i did notice when driving past that the airport strip was lit up and there was activity going on which is unusual to see at night at this particular airport. 
i would have written this off as my imagination being overactive if i hadnt checked your site and seen that someone to the north of me reported seeing what i saw at about the same time. 
now im wondering exactly what it was that we both were seeing so i thought i should share my story if it will help identify what that was. there could be a valid explanation...Or not. 
p.S. my  picture and clip wont attach to this form but if someone from mufon would like to email me with an email address i think i can attach them that way. thank you.
content.summary: Large, bright yellow stationary object low in sky. no other discernable lights. airplane was to the right of it  at same height and was moving and audible as if checking out the object

content.detailedDescription: Our home is in the hills, homes have alot of acreage between them, my granddaughter noticed lights in sky through picture window in house over hills, not very high up in the sky, my daughter, grandson and i came to see what she was calling us for, we all observed rectangular/starlike objects which seemed detached from each other and connected at the same time, about 745am mt clear skies, very bright glowing white/silverish shimmering alternating appearance, rapid movement, stayed in one place and rapid movement of lights made it hard to get a fix on any more detail, lasted about 3 minutes, witnessed by 4 family members, instantly disappeared as we viewed, just poof and it was gone, i went outside about 10 minutes after disappearance and the air seemed electrically charged, fresh and had a lightness about it, noticed that clarity of landscape, colors and sounds of many birds seemed more vibrant and enhanced, lasted about one minute or so although the residual effect on me personally lasted throughout the day as far as feeling charged up, at first we felt a bit stunned by what we were seeing and we just viewed it in awe of how beautiful it looked as if time stood still, almost as if it was a normal occurence, what we observed was clear and beautiful, unprepared to video or take photo
content.summary: Shimmering white/silver lights suddenly appeared in sky changing form rectangular to starlike 3 min approx disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I personally did not have this experience. but i feel that it is time to make this public to examine if anyone else has had this experience. it took place in south west wisconsin on the border with illinois. this takes place in about a quarter mile from the ufo hotspot where i have seen a reptoid/cloaked being, triangular ufo's, and orbs and will extrapolate that in the next sighting report. r-- was sleeping in his bed when he was woken by his dog that was barking that was in his bedroom with him. he looked up and saw a 3 foot tall reptoid crouching on his nightstand, clicking at him with disgust. it then darted off. hopefully he can get on here to post a full report, but i felt that it was necessary to put this on here to start discussion if anyone else has witnessed reptilian/reptoid creatures. there's so much crud on the internet i felt it was necessary to get a real story about reptilians out.
content.summary: I did not have this experience, but feel it is time it is reported.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home on swamp road after leaving bucks county community college around 9pm on 1/24/2012 when i observed what first looked like a low flying plane the size of a small jetliner due to its 3 white lights. it appeared to be turning about 30-40 degress. it seemed to be running parallel to swamp road. i thought it was odd, it is not in the flight path for mercer county airport, nj. as i drove closer, i thought that it could not be a plane but a helicopter because it was flying way too slow! it was about 300 - 500 ft it the sky, no more than 1/2 mile away. within the 3 lights there seemed to be interior lights with the structure. i have never seen anything like it. i came to a stop light and rolled down my window as it was passing to take a listen to it ... it was not a jet or a helicopter, it sounded like a electronic humming fan or turbine blades ... i was on a aircraft carrier for 5 years ... no plane i have ever heard. i came home and googled ufo bucks county after remembering sighting years ago. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg] ... this looks like what i saw but from more of a side view and it was not that high in the air ... the 3 lights were white not red. the strange thing is that mufon had a meeting at bccc on 1/24/2009. i have never seen anything like it. i love it.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 white lights turned like a plane but was moving too slow ... interior lights within diamond or triangular structure

content.detailedDescription:
Late night after june 23, 1996 or during the 1st week of july 1996 was heading to bed.  as i passed through my kitchen area i glanced towards my back yard and saw up in the sky an orange rotating object, going around like a diorama or merry-go-round. it was maybe at an angle of 70-80 degrees above the horizon. i could see that there appeared sectional squares/rectangles that were discernable as it rotated. it was going from left to right across the sky. this would be considered going eastbound going towards monticello, ny.  i yelled to my daughter to come and see what i was seeing. she looked, but didn't seem as excited as i was. she did
acknowledge that she saw what i was seeing, but didn't really comment.  the object quickly flew out of site.
  i know what i was seeing wasn't a plane.I has previously been stationed at a naval air station in tx. and live in hawaii where i had an unobstructed view of various types of military and commerical planes taking off and landing from honolulu airport and the adjacent hickham afb 
runways. i observed these planes day and night with military feild binoculars.  the light that night were no way those of a helicopter, jet, commerical or military or props.
content.summary: Disc, orange rotating light along body, moving west to east

content.detailedDescription: I had just clocked in for work so i know it was 5:30am, i'm always there before sunrise.I stepped out of the meeting room, where the time clock is and i don't know why i just looked up, and there it was moving less than 5 miles an hour in an easterly direction. it was completely silent, and it was as big as a football field. i could tell how big it was because it was a clear morning and the stars were shining and as i looked up i couldn't see the stars, i could only see them further over past the outline of this triangle shaped ship. it was only about 500 feet above me as i watched it in awe as it moved slowly east, then in an instant it streaked across the sky so fast that i couldn't hardly follow it with my eyes. afterwords i felt like i had worked a whole day, my adrenaline must have been pumping hard while i was looking at this thing. it only lasted a few seconds but seemed like longer it was like everything was in slow motion while i was walking and looking up and then all of a sudden it just picked up speed and streaked away towards the north east.
content.summary: It was triangle shaped , moving slowly about 500 feeet above me my heart was pounding

content.detailedDescription: Late after noon me and my brother was in the front yard we lived in succeess valley foot hills of the sierra,s looked up and saw 4 objects traveling east 3 side by side 1 back i noticed they were traveling fast to the mountains i did not think much of it i thought aircraft reflecting light but the sun was still high i watched till i heard a rooring sound back west 2 fighters that had to come from lemoore naval base when the got over head i could see they were chaseing the lights that then turnd 45 degrees and just shot over the mountains north east and just plain left the jets in the dust jets banked left but they were just not fast as the lights i did not know at that time till i joined the navy the jets where in after burners for me to have heard them so soon i estimated the light where traveling twice the speed of the jets never told any one not even my brother i have seen other strange things but those are things that jet pilots would probably not wont to know
content.summary: Lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: We were outside trying to view the northern lights projected to be seen tonight.  suddenly, to our south, we noticed a light in the sky that appeared to be a triangle with flame coming from the corners and then it appeared to turn into an orb and was going all over the sky.  two others appeared from different directions.
content.summary: Changed from triangle to orb, glowing, with flame coming from tips of triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my trash can to the curb when this pulsating star like light caught my eye. i watched thinking it could be a plane when i saw there were two objects, one atop the other. i went and got some binoculars and could see the objects were pulsating with several color of lights. i went inside got my wife and she saw the same objects.
content.summary: Pulsating lights (2) one above the other. stationary

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down elm street in el cerrito, ca on 1/23/2012.  it was clear out, so i was looking up at the stars.  when i looked up, for aprox. 45 seconds, there was this amazingly bright light whose flight path streaked across the entire sky.  there was no tail, and it was faster than a shooting star.  the light was unnatural like a super white led.  it streaked across the sky and disappeared.  there was no obstruction of view, it simply vanished.
content.summary: Appeared to be a shooting star, but unnaturally bright lights, faster than any known object.  straight flight then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 6:50pm on saturday january 21, 2012 i looked out my west facing master bedroom window from the northeast side of colorado springs. i saw a bright object in the sky to the southwest of me. i at first thought it was a star, but noticed it was much brighter and somewhat larger than a typical star. 

i next thought it was probably venus, which i still have some lingering thoughts that it was, but then i noticed something odd. the clouds that were closer to the object were getting scanned by what looked like a search light moving in a circular fashion towards the clouds around the object. 

i thought perhaps a ground based search light, but i was unable to see any beam emanating from the ground, and there were no planes or helicopters in the vicinity at the time. i later observed a plane cross under the object further out in the distance. 

i did grab my video camera and recorded the object from my second floor master bedroom window at first, but i was unable to get a good shot of the cloud scan so i moved outside for a bit to record and see if i could capture the event better. i was able to see the light scanning the clouds faintly on the video, but as the cold settled in, i retreated inside and about 10 mins after that the object was no longer visible in the sky either from outside or my master bedroom window on the second floor.

i still feel that i was viewing venus and the search light was just a coincidence even though i couldn't trace a beam and the circular patter was strange. i am posting this report as i have doubts about what i saw and i am wondering if anyone else reported a similar event. i do have the video footage and would be happy to have it looked at by a mufon investigator if they feel the need to see it.
content.summary: I believe i mis-identified it, but there were a few factors that make me question what i saw.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was pulling up my vehicle to benny's parking lot, nose of vehicle facing benny's store front. i exited vehicle facing benny's, stretched a little and adjusted my pant legs (they were wet) and got ready to go inside...

2. what made you first notice the object? 

i heard a bird and turned to the direction (off to my left, slightly up) to see it, noticed several black-ish birds flying in a small flock, the birds were heading toward my left & i watched them switch direction... as they switched direction and headed off behind me in a diagonal projectory..I noticed another black thing flying along. in my thoughts, i was wondering why this bird was flying slower than the rest..Observed it..Realized it wasnt a bird at all. 


3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

a bird slightly above the flock of birds, just flying slower than the rest.

when my eye singled it out and noticed its shape wasnt a bird, i also noticed object was bigger than the birds i had seen. 

the object stood out, just before & as the birds switched direction. the object stayed on a straight path. the birds flew off in a diagonal path.


4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail. 

the object turned out not being a bird at all, but a diamond shape, dimensional, flat black in color. its projectory did not follow the birds diagonally after the birds switched direction. it continued on flying (smoothly) toward my left, over my head, then on to my right side and kept going towards and over the adjacent parking lots. when it flew as far as (what seemed) price right & soveign bank (taunton ave) parking lot, it stopped and hovered. at this point, the ufo was tiny to my eye & i decided to go in to benny's. when exiting benny's (it was short, because benny's didnt have what i was looking for) i looked back to the last place i seen the ufo hover & it was still there, but appeared to now be moving...I watched it until i could not see it anymore due to distance. during the sighting, the object did not make any sound what so ever. it was distinctively diamond shaped. i saw a slight almost transparent potrusion off the diamond's point (pointing the direction it was going)it was stiff & not floppy, like a balloon string or anything like it. i could barely see this part of the ufo. i did not see this part of the ufo when it was overhead. there was no glare on this object, but you could see a dimension to the shape. it was not a flat bottom to this object. it moved smoothly across the sky and did not flutter, waver, bob, or nothing like that. just straight and smooth. there were other people pulling into a parking space, but i dont think they seen it or knew what i was looking up at.  

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

calm, amazed, fascinated, surprised, excited, calm again.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

lost sight of it due to distance.
content.summary: A single black diamond shape in a straight line path

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my driveway at 11:26am today 01/24/2012. i looked up and saw an airplane (very high up, so i couldn't make out the plane's body, but assumed it was a large plane due to the large contrail) heading west from birmingham, alabama, and was thinking of the contrail it was leaving. the reason for this is because on december 3, 2011, i took a photo of an odd contrail with evenly spaced ripples, and i had never seen anything like it before (i will provide the picture of the contrail from dec. 3rd). back to today, i was looking at the plane, and that's when i noticed a larger object behind, and just slightly lower in the horizon trailing the plane. i wouldn't have thought to much about it if the sun hadn't reflected off of the object as i was looking at it. this object was definitely larger, and did not have any form of contrail behind it and it was keeping up with the airplane. i watched this for about 3-4 minutes until they both went behind the trees in my front yard, so i went to the end of my driveway (about 45ft), and i was able to see the airplane, but not the object anymore. it never crossed my mind to get a camera, but i got my phone and called my brother in kansas city, mo at 11:36am to tell him. as i was on the phone with him, i noticed an airplane heading east towards birmingham, al. (also pretty high up), and i noticed the object again. this time i was only able to see the object for about 15-20 seconds, and then it just disappeared, but the airplane was still in view. this is the second time i've seen something strange, and the first time both myself and my mother saw something in kansas city, mo back in 2008 that was unexplainable to us. i wish i could see this again to prove i'm not crazy, but this was the most exciting thing for me since seeing the other object in 2008. again, i am posting a picture of a strange contrail that i saw back on december 3, 2011. it's different from any other contrail i've seen, and i used to live close to whiteman afb in missouri.
content.summary: It appeared to be tracking the airplane i was looking at.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 730pm we were waiting in the parking lot. i looked over at these red lights coming over the mountains in line formation.I thought maybe military parachuting, but once the red lights got over the mountains it looked like they all spread out then lifted up higher into the sky all together all at the same time and pace then disappeared.
content.summary: I saw  about 10 red lights in line formation coming over the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: walked out on the balcony and notice a metallic glinting object in the sky. first i thought it was a satellite but realized it was stationary(was using rooftop as a point of reference). after about 7ish minutes it just disappeared. no cloud cover.
content.summary: Metallic object was hovering very high up, stationary not a satellite

content.detailedDescription: I had lain down approximately 10:30 pm on the 23 of january 2012 to go to sleep. i had not been laying there for too long when i felt what i can best describe as a wave of paralysis starting with my feet and moving to my head quickly. i could not move nor open my eyes. i heard a low humming sound. i quickly became frightened. my 7 year old boxer sleeps on the bed next to me and did not make a move or sound so i am not sure if she noticed anything herself. i felt like i was becoming weightless. i woke up at 5:15 am on the 24th feeling as if i had just laid down and remember fleeting images of a dream i had just had involving me several human like entities. this is not the first time this has happened to me and i felt like it is time to tell someone. i have actually had many encounters with the unknown but have never come forward.
content.summary: Laying in bed, paralysis, feeling of weightlessness, humming, broken mental images of human like entities

content.detailedDescription:
While on vacation in ireland i took this photo overlooking lough leane in county kerry, just east of the popular "ladies view" area. i was aiming for my shot of the landscape, when i saw the object come into view. i watched it cross the sky until it went out-of-sight behind the hills on the left. we had seen a helicopter just a few moments before this, headed in the opposite direction, but at a greater altitude.

in the attached picture, you'll see the object just left of center, above the  hill. a second picture attached is my attempt at creating a close-up view from the original picture.

thanks,

mike
content.summary: Gray saucer appeared from behind a mountain, headed level towards east.

content.detailedDescription:
While on vacation in ireland i took this photo overlooking lough leane in county kerry, just east of the popular "ladies view" area. i was aiming for my shot of the landscape, when i saw the object come into view. i watched it cross the sky until it went out-of-sight behind the hills on the left. we had seen a helicopter just a few moments before this, headed in the opposite direction, but at a greater altitude.

in the attached picture, you'll see the object just left of center, above the  hill. a second picture attached is my attempt at creating a close-up view from the original picture.

thanks,

mike
content.summary: Gray saucer appeared from behind a mountain, headed level towards east.

content.detailedDescription: At 7:35 am, my son saw what appeared to be a bright shining star to the east. as i slowed down to look at it, it began to move in a western direction. in what time it took for him to get the camera up on my phone it had moved a long way very. so far that i could not find it in the view finder. as it passed in front of my van, it was actually flying quite low. low enough that we could tell that it was actually cigar shaped and very shiney white. it was low enough that we could tell that there were no wings and it definitely was not an air plane.
content.summary: Fast moving cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
1992 going to work at edwards afb on hiway 395 bteween adlento and cramer junction. it was about 2-2:30 am starry night. 
     i observed a very lager ufo moving north. i noticed the object when my vehical stopped running. 
     i got out to see what the problem might be and to my left and up i noticed the stars were not visible. i started looking and noticed a very large slow moving object. 
     it was about 500 ft to 1 mile away. it was a shape of a delta wing, but the front or nose was cut off flat. it was about 1000 ft across and length of 3-400 ft. no lights, sound. this vehical was way too large to be moving that slow and still flying. it continued north towards ridgecrest until it was out of sight over the mountains.The siting lasted about 10-15 minutes.
     my vehical started and i continued to work, i asked coworkers if anyone had seen anything, they had not.
content.summary: Very large ufo

content.detailedDescription: Call me if you want more infor.Have pics
content.summary: While taking pics of lights it cane down 15to20 fts in front of me

content.detailedDescription: Mostly white light, pulsing blue and red. drifted slowly across sky, until it was lost from sight behind trees. took about 10-15 mins to travel about half a mile, no noise was heard and object was about a mile away.
content.summary: Mostly white light, pulsing blue and red. drifted slowly across sky, until it was lost from sight behind trees

content.detailedDescription: Mostly white light, pulsing blue and red. drifted slowly across sky, until it was lost from sight behind trees. took about 10-15 mins to travel about half a mile, no noise was heard and object was about a mile away.
content.summary: Mostly white light, pulsing blue and red. drifted slowly across sky, until it was lost from sight behind trees

content.detailedDescription: We noticed a small dot in the sky. i used zoom of my camera to see what it is.  it was a strange object or a group of objects flying together, changing shape and direction. they disappeared after 15 minutes.
content.summary: We noticed a small dot in the sky. i used zoom of my camera to see what it is.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and went outside for a cigarette looked up at the sky and saw what looked like a star but it was moving across the sky in a line. i thought it could be a satellite but it was moving quite slow then about 10 seconds later just disappeared. i couldnt understand if it was a satellite how could it just vanish like that especially when it didnt go across the horizon line? i wanted to run inside to get my camera but it was already gone. the crazy thing is i was just watching a you tube clip of ufo sightings in cyprus this month and once it had finished thats when i went outside and there one was! i sound like a crazy person but to me that was a message, the last time i would have watched a video of a ufo was years ago so theres some strange synchronicity going on here! i have never posted on a site like this before and it took me a while to search for one but hopefully someone else spotted it too so i can prove to myself im not crazy haha
content.summary: Star-like object moving across sky in a line for approximately 10 seconds then just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Just on my way home from work at 1-15 am,got out of my car to open gates of my house,just happened to look up and saw what looked like a blue ball of flame just above the trees but as it past over me it seemed to be a solid object ,watched it for about 5/6 seconds but it was travelling so fast it was out of range,it was also compleatly silent,it was travelling from east to west.
content.summary: Like a big ball of blue light just above trees  travelling at great speed but appeared to be solid object
